events.name: ZincPower supply chain structure
events.wd_description: The supply chain structure for ZincPower involves two sales channels for zinc-nickel batteries: traditional retail sales and simultaneous renting and selling. ZincPower and downstream retailers form a Stackelberg game with ZincPower as the leader, and consumers strategically choose channels based on their utility.
events.description: The supply chain structure for ZincPower involves two sales channels for zinc-nickel batteries: traditional retail sales and simultaneous renting and selling. ZincPower and downstream retailers form a Stackelberg game with ZincPower as the leader, and consumers strategically choose channels based on their utility.

events.name: ZincPower
events.wd_description: ZincPower acts as the leader in the supply chain, selling zinc-nickel batteries through traditional retail and renting simultaneously.
events.description: ZincPower acts as the leader in the supply chain, selling zinc-nickel batteries through traditional retail and renting simultaneously.

events.name: Downstream retailers
events.wd_description: Downstream retailers interact with ZincPower in a Stackelberg game structure.
events.description: Downstream retailers interact with ZincPower in a Stackelberg game structure.

events.name: Consumers
events.wd_description: Consumers choose sales channels based on their utility.
events.description: Consumers choose sales channels based on their utility.

events.name: Evolutionary games in supply chain management
events.wd_label: Evolutionary games in supply chain management
events.wd_description: Evolutionary games in nonlinear dynamic systems in supply chain management can lead to complex dynamics, including chaos. The existing literature elaborates on these complex behaviors in detail.
events.description: Evolutionary games in nonlinear dynamic systems in supply chain management can lead to complex dynamics, including chaos. The existing literature elaborates on these complex behaviors in detail.

events.name: Evolutionary games
events.wd_description: Evolutionary games are used to model various interactions in supply chain management.
events.description: Evolutionary games are used to model various interactions in supply chain management.

events.name: Nonlinear dynamic systems
events.wd_description: Supply chain management is modeled using nonlinear dynamic systems.
events.description: Supply chain management is modeled using nonlinear dynamic systems.

events.name: Complex dynamics
events.wd_description: The complex dynamics in supply chains can lead to chaos, as detailed in existing literature.
events.description: The complex dynamics in supply chains can lead to chaos, as detailed in existing literature.

events.name: Research on dynamic game models and stability
events.wd_label: Research on dynamic game models and stability
events.wd_description: Various studies have examined dynamic game models and the stability of supply chains, focusing on aspects such as price competition, delayed bounded rationality, and delayed feedback control methods to manage chaos.
events.description: Various studies have examined dynamic game models and the stability of supply chains, focusing on aspects such as price competition, delayed bounded rationality, and delayed feedback control methods to manage chaos.

events.name: Dynamic game models
events.wd_description: Studies have established dynamic game models to analyze different supply chain scenarios.
events.description: Studies have established dynamic game models to analyze different supply chain scenarios.

events.name: Stability analysis
events.wd_description: Stability analysis is performed on supply chain systems using various models.
events.description: Stability analysis is performed on supply chain systems using various models.

events.name: Delayed feedback control
events.wd_description: Delayed feedback control methods are applied to manage chaos in supply chain systems.
events.description: Delayed feedback control methods are applied to manage chaos in supply chain systems.

events.name: Oligopoly market of zinc-nickel batteries in China
events.wd_label: Oligopoly market of zinc-nickel batteries in China
events.wd_description: The domestic zinc-nickel battery market in China is an oligopoly, dominated by a few large-scale, high-output enterprises. Modeling and simulation of this market will be conducted to analyze the sales situation.
events.description: The domestic zinc-nickel battery market in China is an oligopoly, dominated by a few large-scale, high-output enterprises. Modeling and simulation of this market will be conducted to analyze the sales situation.

events.name: Large-scale enterprises
events.wd_description: There are a few large-scale enterprises producing zinc-nickel batteries in China, including CHILWEE Power Supply Co., Ltd., ZincPower (Tianjin) New Energy Co., Ltd., and Chaoli (Henan) New Energy Co., Ltd.
events.description: There are a few large-scale enterprises producing zinc-nickel batteries in China, including CHILWEE Power Supply Co., Ltd., ZincPower (Tianjin) New Energy Co., Ltd., and Chaoli (Henan) New Energy Co., Ltd.

events.name: Oligopoly market
events.wd_description: The zinc-nickel battery market in China is characterized as an oligopoly.
events.description: The zinc-nickel battery market in China is characterized as an oligopoly.

events.name: Supply chain modeling
events.wd_description: Supply chain modeling and simulation will be conducted to analyze the sales situation of zinc-nickel batteries in the oligopoly market.
events.description: Supply chain modeling and simulation will be conducted to analyze the sales situation of zinc-nickel batteries in the oligopoly market.

events.name: Traditional retail sales channel
events.description: One of the sales channels used by ZincPower for zinc-nickel batteries.

events.name: Renting and selling simultaneously
events.description: Another sales channel where ZincPower rents and sells zinc-nickel batteries.

events.name: Stackelberg game
events.description: A strategic game in the supply chain where ZincPower is the leader.

events.name: Chaos in supply chain
events.description: Complex dynamics such as chaos found in the supply chain management.

events.name: Bounded rationality
events.description: Concept used to describe decision-making processes that are rational within limits.
